name: complicate
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make something more difficult to deal with, do, or understand
trans_examp.trans_cn: 使复杂化；使更难懂；使更麻烦

example.eg: It will only complicate the situation if we invite his old girlfriend as well.
example.egtrans: 如果我们同时也邀请他以前的女友，只会使事情更加复杂。

example.eg: The rescue operation has been complicated by bad weather.
example.egtrans: 恶劣的天气使救援工作变得更加艰难。

example.eg: These new rules have complicated the tax system even further.
example.egtrans: 这些新规定使税收制度更加复杂。

trans_examp.trans_en: If one illness complicates another illness, it makes the other illness worse.

example.eg: The breathing problem has now been complicated by a chest infection.
example.egtrans: 因为胸腔感染，他的呼吸问题变得更加严重了。
